cards.title: The Last Monster Hunter
setup: Cards are revealed from the top of the villain deck until 2 Weapons and 1 Upgrade are revealed and put into play. Other revealed cards are shuffled back into the villain deck.
gameplay: Reduce damage dealt to this card by by 2. When this card would be dealt fire damage by a villain target, prevent it and add that many tokens to this card's heat pool.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are at least 10 tokens in this card's heat pool, {TheLastMonsterHunter} flips.
At the end of the villain turn, activate the [b]Attack[/b] text on each Weapon in play.
cards.advanced: Reduce damage dealt to Upgrades and Weapons by 1.
flippedGameplay: Increase damage dealt to villain targets by 1.
The first time each turn {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals each target non-fire damage, he deals that target 2 fire damage.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are no tokens in this card's heat pool, {TheLastMonsterHunter} flips.
At the end of the villain turn, this card deals each target 2 fire damage, then remove 10 tokens from this card's heat pool.
cards.flippedAdvanced: Increase damage dealt to hero targets by 1.
cards.challengeText: At the end of the villain turn, remove {H - 2} tokens from this card's Heat Pool.

openingLines.default: I must protect humanity... from you.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.TheReverseEngineerCh: I've tracked you to the ends of space and time! Your terror ends here!

tokenPools.name: The Last Monster Hunter's' Heat Pool

cards.title: Heat Sink Array
body: Villain targets are immune to fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: That's an extremely efficient design,{br}I'll have to copy that.

cards.title: Pulsejet
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {TheLastMonsterHunter} by 1. At the end of the villain turn, {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 2} melee damage.
cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Monster Hunted #3

cards.title: Point-Defense Cannons
body: Whenever a hero card is played, {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals its owner 1 projectile damage.

flavorQuotes.text: As long he’s got those guns,{br}we can’t even get close!

cards.title: Colossal Chainsaw

activatableAbilities.name: attack
activatableAbilities.text: {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals the 2 hero targets with the lowest HP {H - 1} melee damage each, then this card deals {TheLastMonsterHunter} 2 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Oof, that’s gonna leave a mark.

cards.flavorReference: The Reverse Engineer, Guardians of Tomorrow #100

cards.title: Incendiary Missiles

activatableAbilities.name: attack
activatableAbilities.text: {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals each non-villain target 2 fire damage, then this card deals {TheLastMonsterHunter} 2 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: So you like to play with fire?

cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Guardians of Tomorrow #100

cards.title: Lightning Cannon

activatableAbilities.name: attack
activatableAbilities.text: {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals each target in the play area of the hero with the most cards in play {H} lightning damage, then this card deals {TheLastMonsterHunter} 2 fire damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Your scrap is just a lightning{br}rod for me.

cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Monster Hunted #5

cards.title: Sustained Barrage
body: Activate the [b]Attack[/b] text on the Weapon with the highest HP. {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H - 1} projectile damage.

cards.title: Emergency Repairs

flavorQuotes.text: That only slows me down! I'll be back!

cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Monster Hunted #4

cards.title: Crushing Grip
body: {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} melee damage. That target may not deal damage until the start of the villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I have you now. No more running.

cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Monster Hunted #1

cards.title: Aggressive Heat Bleed
body: If there are no tokens in {TheLastMonsterHunter}'s Heat Pool, play the top card of the villain deck. If there are at least 5 tokens, {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals each hero target 2 fire damage. If there are at least 10 tokens, {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals himself 3 fire damage, then play the top card of the villain deck.

flavorQuotes.text: Look out! It's too hot to touch!

cards.title: Technologically Superior
body: {TheLastMonsterHunter} deals each non-villain target 2 lightning damage. Each hero dealt damage this way must destroy one of their non-character cards.

flavorQuotes.text: Your monstrous powers are no match{br}for my technology!

cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Guardians of Tomorrow #99

cards.title: Field Refit
body: Reveal cards from the villain deck until a Weapon is revealed. Put it into play and shuffle the remaining cards back into the villain deck. Activate its Attack text and reduce damage dealt to it by 1 until the start of the villain turn.

flavorQuotes.text: When I return to battle, I will be{br}far more powerful than before.

cards.flavorReference: The Last Monster Hunter, Monster Hunted #1
